name: The Last Axe (Bromberry Games)
description:
This is a prototype for a roguelike that is based on our submission for the GMTK game jam 2019.

Your axe is your weapon, but you can use it only one throw at a time. Run around an old factory chased by adroit androids that stop you from getting your axe back. Each on their own might not be a tasking fight, but together they'll push you into a corner with ease. See if you can escape them!

These are humble beginnings, but if you would like to see what is next for us you can:

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/BromberryG
